name: Uplift AI
long_description:
We build speech understanding and speech generation models for regional languages, and make them available through easy to use APIs and SDKs.

A billion people can't read any language. Additionally, in most languages typing is really hard/slow. As a result, text-interfaces (apps and websites) haven't worked in emerging markets and most work have remained offline. This is causing economies billions of dollars in lost worker efficiency.

Voice AI can fix this, and onboard 100s of millions of new users on to digital services -- for the first time. 

But current Voice Models suck... After the top 5 languages, the models are so bad you can't make any Voice product on top of them. We are fixing this by creating state of the art models for regional languages. 

We are able to do this coz we created unique data gathering and labeling methods to solve for small languages. We already have SOTA models in multiple languages (like Balochi, Sindhi).

We are on a mission to uplift entire nations by giving everyone access to digital information and digital services. 

Team:
Our team has previously created Voice technology used by millions daily. We worked on Alexa and Siri; And have launched entire AWS services like AWS Bedrock Guardrails.
 
We do in-house research and development. We gather our own data, then train and deploy our own models. We own our technology stack end-to-end.
one_liner: Foundational Voice Models for regional languages
